comments: Pisot sequence T(6,8).Trivial case of a Pisot sequence satisfying a simple linear recurrence. Here, since round((2n+2)^2/(2n)^2) = 2n + round((n+1)/n^2) = 2n for n>2, a(n) is even and a(n) = a(n-1) + 2. - _Ralf Stephan_, Sep 03 2013
crossrefs: Subsequence of A005843. See A008776 for definitions of Pisot sequences.
